remarks.para: External clipped sine TCXO AC-connected to XTA pin

Normal mode, a single packet is sent
Continuous mode, send multiple packets across the FIFO (used for spectral analysis)

member.summary: Action taken after acceptance of a packet in Listen mode

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.ListenEnd.Rx
member.summary: Chip stays in Rx mode. Listen mode stops and must be disabled.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.ListenEnd.Mode
member.summary: chip stays in Rx mode until PayloadReady orTimeout interrupt occurs. It then goes to the mode defined by Mode.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.ListenEnd.Idle
member.summary: chip stays in Rx mode until PayloadReady or Timeout interrupt occurs. Listen mode then resumes in Idle state. FIFO content is lost at next Rx wakeup.

member.name: T:RfmUsb.Net.ListenResolution
member.summary: Resolution of Listen mode Idle time

member.summary: Valid Lora signal detected during CAD operation

member.summary: No irq mask flags are set

member.summary: Cad Detected Interrupt Mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags

member.summary: FHSS change channel interrupt mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags

member.summary: CAD complete interrupt mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags

member.summary: FIFO Payload transmission complete interrupt mask: setting this bit Masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags

member.summary: Valid header received in Rx Mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags

member.summary: Payload CRC error interrupt Mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.LoraIrqFlagsMask.RxDoneMask
member.summary: Packet reception complete interrupt Mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.LoraIrqFlagsMask.RxTimeoutMask
member.summary: Timeout interrupt Mask: setting this bit masks the corresponding IRQ in RegIrqFlags

member.summary: Filter coefficients in average mode of the OOK demodulator

member.summary: Size of each decrement of the RSSI threshold in the OOKdemodulator

member.summary: Selects type of threshold in the OOK data slicer

member.summary: Rise/Fall time of ramp up/down in FSK

member.summary: Gets or sets the byte encoding for pre- and post-transmission conversion of text.

member.summary: Gets the state of the Clear-to-Send line.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether null bytes are ignored when transmitted between the port and the receive buffer.

member.summary: Gets or sets the standard length of data bits per byte.

member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the input buffer.

member.name: P:RfmUsb.Net.Ports.ISerialPort.ParityReplace
member.summary: Gets or sets the byte that replaces invalid bytes in a data stream when a parity error occurs.

member.summary: Gets or sets the port for communications, including but not limited to all available COM ports.

member.name: P:RfmUsb.Net.Ports.ISerialPort.CDHolding
member.summary: Gets the state of the Carrier Detect line for the port.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds before a time-out occurs when a read operation does not finish.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of bytes in the internal input buffer before a .DataReceived event occurs.

member.summary: Gets or sets the parity-checking protocol.

member.summary: Discards data from the serial driver's receive buffer.

member.summary: Discards data from the serial driver's transmit buffer.

member.summary: Reads a number of characters from the input buffer and writes them into an array of characters at a given offset.

member.summary: Synchronously reads one byte from the input buffer.

member.name: M:RfmUsb.Net.Ports.ISerialPort.ReadChar
member.summary: Synchronously reads one character from the input buffer.

member.name: M:RfmUsb.Net.Ports.ISerialPort.ReadExisting
member.summary: Reads all immediately available bytes, based on the encoding, in both the stream and the input buffer of the object.

member.summary: Reads up to the .NewLine value in the input buffer.

member.name: M:RfmUsb.Net.Ports.ISerialPort.ReadTo(System.String)

member.name: T:RfmUsb.Net.PreambleDetectorSize
member.summary: Number of Preamble bytes to detect to trigger an interrupt

member.name: M:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69},RfmUsb.Net.Ports.ISerialPortFactory)
member.param: The instance for creating and querying serial port instances

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.CrcOK
member.summary: Set in Rx when the CRC of the payload is Ok. Cleared when FIFO is empty.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.PayloadReady
member.summary: Set in Rx when the payload is ready (i.e. last byte received and CRC, if enabled and CrcAutoClearOff is cleared,is Ok). Cleared when FIFO is empty.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.PacketSent
member.summary: Set in Tx when the complete packet has been sent. Cleared when exiting Tx.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.FifoOverrun
member.summary: Set when FIFO overrun occurs. (except in Sleep mode) Flag(s) and FIFO are cleared when this bit is set. The FIFO then becomes immediately available for the next transmission/reception

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.FifoLevel
member.summary: Set when the number of bytes in the FIFO strictly exceeds FifoThreshold, else cleared.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.FifoNotEmpty
member.summary: Set when FIFO contains at least one byte, else cleared

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.FifoFull
member.summary: Set when FIFO is full (i.e. contains 66 bytes), else cleared

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.SyncAddressMatch
member.summary: Set when Sync and Address (if enabled) are detected. Cleared when leaving Rx or FIFO is emptied. This bit is read only in Packet mode, rwc in Continuous mode

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.AutoMode
member.summary: Set when entering Intermediate mode. Cleared when exiting Intermediate mode. Please note that in Sleep mode a small delay can be observed between AutoMode interrupt and the corresponding enter/exit condition.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.Timeout
member.summary: Set when a timeout occurs (see TimeoutRxStart and TimeoutRssiThresh) Cleared when leaving Rx or FIFO is emptied.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.Rssi
member.summary: Set in Rx when the RssiValue exceeds RssiThreshold. Cleared when leaving Rx.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.PllLock
member.summary: Set (in FS, Rx or Tx) when the PLL is locked. Cleared when it is not.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.TxReady
member.summary: Set in Tx mode, after PA ramp-up. Cleared when leaving Tx.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.RxReady
member.summary: Set in Rx mode, after RSSI, AGC and AFC. Cleared when leaving Rx.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm69IrqFlags.ModeReady
member.summary: Set when the operation mode requested in Mode, is ready - Sleep: Entering Sleep mode - Standby: XO is running - FS: PLL is locked - Rx: RSSI sampling starts - Tx: PA ramp-up completed Cleared when changing operating mode.

member.name: M:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9x.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9x},RfmUsb.Net.Ports.ISerialPortFactory)
member.summary: Create an instance of a device
member.param: The instance for creating and querying serial port instances

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.LowBattery
member.summary: Set when the battery voltage drops below the Low Battery threshold.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.CrcOK
member.summary: Set in Rx when the CRC of the payload is Ok. Cleared when FIFO is empty.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.PayloadReady
member.summary: Set in Rx when the payload is ready (i.e. last byte received and CRC, if enabled and CrcAutoClearOff is cleared,is Ok). Cleared when FIFO is empty.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.PacketSent
member.summary: Set in Tx when the complete packet has been sent. Cleared when exiting Tx.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.FifoOverrun
member.summary: Set when FIFO overrun occurs. (except in Sleep mode) Flag(s) and FIFO are cleared when this bit is set. The FIFO then becomes immediately available for the next transmission/reception

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.FifoLevel
member.summary: Set when the number of bytes in the FIFO strictly exceeds FifoThreshold, else cleared.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.FifoNotEmpty
member.summary: Set when FIFO contains at least one byte, else cleared

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.FifoFull
member.summary: Set when FIFO is full (i.e. contains 66 bytes), else cleared

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.SyncAddressMatch
member.summary: Set when Sync and Address (if enabled) are detected. Cleared when leaving Rx or FIFO is emptied. This bit is read only in Packet mode, rwc in Continuous mode

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.PreambleDetect
member.summary: Set when the Preamble Detector has found valid Preamble.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.Timeout
member.summary: Set when a timeout occurs. Cleared when leaving Rx or FIFO is emptied.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.Rssi
member.summary: Set in Rx when the RssiValue exceeds RssiThreshold. Cleared when leaving Rx.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.PllLock
member.summary: Set (in FS, Rx or Tx) when the PLL is locked. Cleared when it is not.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.TxReady
member.summary: Set in Tx mode, after PA ramp-up. Cleared when leaving Tx.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.RxReady
member.summary: Set in Rx mode, after RSSI, AGC and AFC. Cleared when leaving Rx.

member.name: F:RfmUsb.Net.Rfm9xIrqFlags.ModeReady
member.summary: Set when the operation mode requested in Mode, is ready - Sleep: Entering Sleep mode - Standby: XO is running - FS: PLL is locked - Rx: RSSI sampling starts - Tx: PA ramp-up completed Cleared when changing operating mode.
